actions.name: Incarnate Storm
actions.description: Passive: The user does not suffer detrimental effects from Rain, Snow, Sand, Fog, or Gloomy Weather. The Range of the user's [Wind] attacks increases by +40% (minimum 2), and their [Blast X] increases by +1.

actions.name: Incarnate Storm
actions.description: Effect: The user may set a [Weather] associated with one of its Types, and gains +1 SPATK and SPDEF Stage for 5 Activations.

system.description:
Effect: The user may set a [Weather] associated with one of its Types, and gains +1 SPATK and SPDEF Stage for 5 Activations.

Passive: The user does not suffer detrimental effects from Rain, Snow, Sand, Fog, or Gloomy Weather. The Range of the user's [Wind] attacks increases by +40% (minimum 2), and their [Blast X] increases by +1.
